step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder blades are moving well, but try to bring them further back and down. Focus on the circular motion.
Good job squeezing your shoulder blades back! For the next repetitions, try to make the downward part of the circle more pronounced.
Excellent! You're really getting the circular motion down. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to breathe deeply as you do this to help with lymphatic flow.
